name: Pixel Minesweeper (JoseluGames)
description:
Pixel Minesweeper

Pixel Minesweeper is just the classical minesweeper in easy mode (8x8 grid with 10 bombs) but with a cute pixel art skin applied.

I might end up adding more content (New mechanics, new difficulty levels, etc.). But for now I just wanted to share it.

I hope you enjoy it!

Controls

Use left click to uncover and right click to place/remove a flag

Credits

Programming, sound and art (Except the font and palettes) is done by me.

The font is Silkscreen (From Jason Aleksandr Kottke of dafont.com)

The palettes are Fantasy24 (From Gabriel C. of lospec.com) and Endesga 64 (From Endesga of lospec.com)
